OK, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Today, you’re
gonna tell me about your love of Pokémon!
(Ask why she picked you.)

Instead of explaining, it’ll be faster if you
just listen!
(Act confused and surprised.)
*chuckle* Sorry to impose so suddenly.
The reason I’m here is on my Poryphone!

I asked everyone on Pasio for tips on how to get
along with Pokémon, and I recorded their answers.
So let’s have a listen!

While you shouldn’t be indifferent toward your
Pokémon, you also shouldn’t spoil them.

I believe friendship’s love is what strengthens a
sync pair’s bond.
They said all kinds of things.

But a lot of them told me to ask you for the
real secret.

They said even though their Pokémon don’t usually
warm up to strangers easily...
they take to you right away.
What’s your secret?! Can you tell me?
[Name:PlayerNickname ] shared [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="his" F="her" ] thoughts...

I see, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...
So that’s your approach to Pokémon!
Thanks! That was super informative!

After [Name:PlayerNickname ] learned about
Leaf’s unique investigation...

[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] thought about recording with [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="his" F="her" ]
Poryphone, too.

and you want me to listen?

learn how others see me.
OK, let’s have a listen!
Her love for Pokémon is fantastic!

She doesn’t just care for her Pokémon—in battle,
she showcases the strength of the bond they share.
These are making me blush...
Leaf’s my friend AND my rival!
Oh, you asked Blue, too.
She’s pretty good when it comes to battling!
But just between you and me...

Venusaur. Just cuddling away.

Ugh! Why did Blue have to see that?!
Y-you understand, right?!

comforting! You agree with me, right?
(Tell her it comforts you, too.)
R-right?! Thank goodness it’s not just me!
Our love for Pokémon is real! But...

It’s our secret!
Don’t tell ANYONE...OK?
